table.name: vtiger_rooms
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_rooms` ( `roomsid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `room_type` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `parent_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `parent_name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_roomscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_roomscf` ( `roomsid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`roomsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_rooms_related_modules
vtiger_rooms_user_field
vte_modules
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vte_modules` ( `module` varchar(50) NOT NULL , `valid` int(1) NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`module`));
